node.excerpt: We conducted 5 user testing sessions with Fable Tech Labs to determine which client-side routing techniques are the most accessible to people with disabilities. With this research, we can make more informed decisions for accessible page changes in sites built with Gatsby, React, and beyond.

frontmatter.excerpt: We conducted 5 user testing sessions with Fable Tech Labs to determine which client-side routing techniques are the most accessible to people with disabilities. With this research, we can make more informed decisions for accessible page changes in sites built with Gatsby, React, and beyond.
frontmatter.title: What we learned from user testing of accessible client-side routing techniques with Fable Tech Labs
